response_parsed.title: Implementing Edge Runtimes with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer demonstrates how to create an edge runtime application using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs in Python 3.12+.

Setting up a new FastAPI project with Python 3.12+
Implementing an edge runtime-friendly architecture for your application
Deploying the FastAPI application on an edge runtime platform
